resources.string: An emoji pack based on the emojis found in older Android versions, but updated for newer Emoji standards
The emoji family made by Google
A modern emoji pack that can be found on many modern Android devices\nNoto is a trademark by Google Inc.

Twemoji is an emoji pack that can be found on many platforms throughout the internet, including, of course, Twitter.\nCC BY 4.0, Copyright 2020 Twitter, Inc and other contributors\nAdapted for usage with EmojiCompat
